website_summaries.verdict: Keeps your braids comfortable, shiny and flake-free. Some like the scent; for others, it's an issue.
pros: Moisturizing spray that keeps braids looking shiny
Reduces dandruff and itching, so you can keep braids in longer
Customers attested to its moisturizing power, and said they needed to moisturize less with regular use
cons: Some are sensitive to the formula's slight sulfur scent
A few customers said they received leaky, damaged bottles

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!!
customer_reviews.text: I had terrible flakes and itch whenever I got braids. Nothing was working to tame the problem. I tried castor oil, tea tree oil, argan oil and coconut oil. Nothing worked. This worked the first time I used it. I put it on at least three times a day and NEVER get flakes or itch anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was a Godsend! First time getting box braids, my scalp was on fire and itched so bad. A few sprays and instant relief! It works!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: If you have an itchy scalp this is your product worth the money. I don't have dandruff though.
customer_reviews.text: My hair has been dry this summer and the spray was very much a relieving product, I hope once I install my box braids they are soothing by this and with the growth oil I will be using with it a couple times a week good product worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best Braids Spray!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I previously used this spray when I have braids last year and worked wonders. So I decided to buy my own this time and it worked amazing. By the end of the first week I was able to do what I wanted with the braids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for braids and healthy for your hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff it's very light and it's not greasy and you can spray it right on with the braids I love it.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for about a year, it does a good job of minimizing dandruff and dry scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No strong sulfur smell like most sulfur products
customer_reviews.text: Keeps braids moist considerably reduces itch so common with braids
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T SMELL LIKE SULFUR 8
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT HAS GLYCERIN IN IT LIKE THE JERRY CURL ACTIVATOR SPRAY. I WAS NOT IMPRESSED FOR MY $10.00.!!! PLUS IT LEAVES A STICKY FILM ON YOUR NECK. I GUESS IF YOU SPRAY IT LIGHTLY IT WOULDN'T RUN DOWN YOUR HEAD TO THE BACK OF YOUR NECK,,OH AND WAIT..THE FLUID WAS LEAKING OUTSIDE THE LID EVEN BEFORE I OPENED IT!?!?? I HAD TO PUT IT IN A EMPTY SPRAY BOTTLE . I WISH I WOULD HAVE GOT MY PEPPERMINT OIL OR TEA TREE OIL FOR MY BRAIDS. SUCKS FOR ME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The product was just the way I always knew it to be, it smells the way I expected and great on my scalp when in protective styles.
customer_reviews.author: Chinwe Aniche- Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It keeps my scalp moisturized, so it doesn't get itchy from dandruff. It also arrived almost a week earlier than I expected which was awesome. Great product. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Acqueline

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t smell bad and had no itch from the braids
customer_reviews.author: DOMONIQUE DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product! My bf was able to go longer without taking down his hair due to itching. We will definitely be buying more if this product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sulphur 8 products work.
customer_reviews.text: After many years of using expensive natural hair products, I have returned to "old school" products such as the Sulphur 8 brand. Love this braid spray but I also use as a daily moisturizer for my twist outs. Sulpur 8 products work.
customer_reviews.author: R. Greaves

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this....
customer_reviews.text: Works for my itchy scalp. So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Will always have on hand when I have braids. Helped ease the scalp itch and tension
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Soothes the head I love and recommend for everyone with braids to use this product the samell is light and actually give a good scent if braids are old try it you will like it
customer_reviews.author: Bonitablessed

customer_reviews.title: It helps keep my braids looking nice as well as keeping dandruff at bay
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. It helps keep my braids looking nice as well as keeping dandruff at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Brittini Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Love Sulfer 8 products. I suffer with extremely dry hair due to menopause and this really helps keep it moisturize, also helps to relieve itching due to dry scalp. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: MS. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like and feels like pure water in hair. Nothing to compare with outhe sulfur products i use. Woulg give a zero star if thete was 1.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well to relieve an itchy scalp after several applications.
customer_reviews.author: J G

customer_reviews.title: Solfer8 spray
customer_reviews.text: Been gotten this good for my hair thank you preciate it
customer_reviews.author: Chartara powell

customer_reviews.title: Prevented breakage and it left her hair with a great shine
customer_reviews.text: It did help 38th my child's hair a lot. Prevented breakage and it left her hair with a great shine
customer_reviews.author: T_will

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s sulfur in a spray bottle. The scent is pleasant and not overpowering. Easy to apply to itchy scalp with braids.
customer_reviews.author: AZSapp

customer_reviews.title: Tames The Itch!
customer_reviews.text: I use this when my braids are itchy, & when I’m wearing my Afro..my hair loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Im almost out, I need to order another bottle again, has my braids shiny and keeps them looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie G

customer_reviews.title: Not. What I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Crap spray, was leaking through the package when delivered. Doesn't even smell like the sulfur 8 products. Definitely does not help with scalp itching.
customer_reviews.author: Janika

customer_reviews.title: Bottle arrived wet and sticky, with product spilled out of it.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was wet and sticky, and had leaked out into the package. It’s the second time it’s happened when I ordered this. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandilaren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help tge itch!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, but it only made my hair itch more.
customer_reviews.author: Tiesha Barron

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This spray helps so much with my daughter scalp when she wears her braid's.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Sulphur Braid Spray
customer_reviews.text: This spray is very good for braids, as it lubricates the scalp and keeps it from itching! I also like it because it is light and not oily!
customer_reviews.author: Elect Lady

customer_reviews.title: Items need to be checked before shipment.
customer_reviews.text: The box was soaked with the product. The top was not screwed on tightly before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Does not work like the grease. Doesn’t relieve an itchy scalp.
customer_reviews.author: terria

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Order a 12 oz. And only get off of the amount
customer_reviews.author: Fatta

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product was empty when it arrived everything had leaked the bottle was empty
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Item is received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item was received damaged and most of the contents were spilled out mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: stops my scalp from itching
customer_reviews.text: the best...it stops the itching, soothes my scalp. I will only use this when my hair is braided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product smell like urine and I just toss it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sulfur 8 Is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while now and use it every day to keep my short hair looking better. You dont have to have braids! They stopped selling this brand in stores and had a blue bottle, which was not as good, but still called Sulfur 8. I also have been using the hair grease since the younger days when I had a bush because it kept hair together when the wind blew. Other brands of hair products dont work that well for me. So, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Starks

customer_reviews.title: Does not contain sulfur
customer_reviews.text: I cannot actually comment on the product itself as i never did open it to use it. Got it purely because i thought it had sulfur in it which is good for hair growth, but it had none in it. So only take my review into account if that will bother you too, because I did not even take the plastic wrapper off.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely no dandruff and helps itching.
customer_reviews.text: I use the for my kinky twist and is it amazing. Absolutely no dandruff and helps itching. The smell doesn't bother me and it fades away within minutes. I use it as needed and there is no build up. If you have braids get this.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WORKS WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works!!! I had purchased this because I had braids put in by someone and the hair used had my scalp feeling super itchy non stop to the point I was ready to cut every braid out and including my scalp,lol. I never had this issue before so I googled home remedies to use and Sulfur 8 as well as Raw apple cider vinegar diluted with water WORKED LIKE HEAVEN. I even bought the grease form of Sulfur 8 loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: ING

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my husband that gets a lot of dandruff & a major itchy scalp with his braids. Haven’t noticed too much of a difference but that also could be because he only sprays his head once a day every few days so he’s gonna start everyday as directed to get a better review
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Ly

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Issues
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray for when I get braids. It helps with itching and maintains the look of my hairstyle. Only issue is the shipping is terrible. Twice I received a leaking empty bottle. Other than that great product. Yes, the smell could be better, but it’s not alarming.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this product; have been using it for years; great if you have dry itchy scalp, no buildup because it's really light so you could use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amjedi

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT FOR ANY BRAIDS and to treat dandruff
customer_reviews.text: BEST INVESTMENT FOR ANY BRAIDS and to treat dandruff. It instantly relieves itching and heals dry scalp. I will definitely buy this in the future. This product is a must-have in your hair care regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stark

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as decribed
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT, sometimes I forget to spray my scalp but when it itches I spray and it REALLY HELPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jillesa Loves to Read

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best product. Does exactly what it’s suppose to. I have psoriasis and this helps me keep my braids in
customer_reviews.author: Sahri

customer_reviews.title: Works for dry flaky problematic scalp
customer_reviews.text: Sulphuric 8 is the only product that works on my dry, flaky scalp. Highly recommend. Been using for years. Hard to find now. Stock up.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH BURKHARD

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair dry
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair a bit dry, will try to see what it does for my scalp
customer_reviews.author: Such-A-Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t have a bad smell
customer_reviews.text: It helped with my when I had my braids, now I passed it to my husband he has braids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't weigh hair down
customer_reviews.text: Keeps scalp and braids clean minimizing itching to keep scalp dandruff 90% free
customer_reviews.author: Keezy Baybe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kept my hair surprisingly moisturized when they were in faux locs. And helped with itch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarafina Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works wonders. I had my braids in only 2 days when I started to feel intense itching. I thought about shaving my head it was so bad. I couldn't sleep. Nothing worked. Then I bought this on Amazon and with the first spray I felt instantly better. It doesn't smell great but it doesn't matter the relief I felt was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Prime User 2005

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well when I had my hair in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well when I had my hair in a braided style, my scalp was much less flaky with use of this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

product_meta.title: Sulphur 8 Braid Spray 12oz
product_meta.description: Dandruff Treatment for Braids. prevents dry itching scalp. Great for: Locks, Twists and Extensions. Use Sulfar8 for softer more comfortable braids. Beautiful braids without the itch. Regular use keeps your braids shiny and natural looking. Controls scalp itching and flaking due to dandruff.
feature_bullets: Regular use keeps your braids shiny and natural looking
Medicated Anti-Dandruff Conditioned and Dandruff Treatment for Braids
